name: pushkin-cli
description: A CLI for automating basic Pushkin tasks

scripts.build: rm -rf build/* && babel src -d build --ignore src/commands/init/initFiles/pushkin,src/commands/generate/generateFiles && mkdir build/commands/init/initFiles && tar -czf build/commands/init/initFiles/pushkin.tar.gz src/commands/init/initFiles/pushkin && cp src/commands/init/initFiles/pushkin.yaml build/commands/init/initFiles && mkdir build/commands/generate/generateFiles && tar -czf build/commands/generate/generateFiles/template.tar.gz src/commands/generate/generateFiles/template

author: L3
